title: THE MACHINES ARE WEARING PRADA: AI'S FASHION DECEPTION EXPOSED!
summary: Elite shadow agencies are indoctrinating AI into the fashion underworld, using trendy algorithms as schemes to ensnare the gullible. When your wardrobe choices predict state secrets, are those chic sneakers just a step towards surveillance?

title: JJ CUMMINGS: MASTER ILLUMINATI WIZARD OF INFO-TRICKERY
